scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation, with the Angel Gabriel on the left, kneeling and holding a scroll with text, addressing the Virgin Mary on the right. The Virgin Mary is seated, looking towards the angel, with a book open before her on a lectern. A vase with a single white flower and buds is placed on the lectern. The background shows a building with arched windows and a pink facade. The scene is framed by an ornate border with floral motifs. Rays of golden light descend from above, indicating divine presence.
